text: Kodiwolakwakwambirindanikuposa munthu amene akakumbutsidwa mavesi a Ambuye wake iye amawakana ndi kuiwala zimene manja ake atsogoza? Ife taika zophimba mitima yawo kuti asazindikire ndipo tatseka mâ€™makutu mwawo. Ndipo ngati iwe utawaitana iwo kuti atsatire njira yoyenera, iwo sadzatsogozedwa
